rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 23 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 11:00 AM, 20 July 2025(Sunday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Zambales, Bataan, Pampanga and Tarlac.

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: Possible FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, expect light to moderate with occasional heavy rains over Metro Manila, Cavite, Rizal, Bulacan, Nueva Ecija and Batangas within the next 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 2:00 PM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 1 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 11:46 AM, 20 July 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(Atimonan, Pagbilao, Mauban, Padre Burgos, Perez, Alabat, Patnanungan, Jomalig) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
